Using the HDI to guide policy goals may also contradict intuitions of justice. Consider the HDI component ‘life expectancy at birth’. HDI will give equal points to the following two expectancies of longevity (Pogge, 2002: 213):
Group 1Group 2
Scenario AWealthier half 70 yearsPoorer half 30 years
Scenario BWealthier half 50 yearsPoorer half 50 years
